document.full_text: arab states have agreed to postpone a summit that was scheduled for may 11 in baghdad, the arab league announced on wednesday, amid disputes over the venue and popular unrest rocking the region.
document.title: arab league delays summit on regional unrest
lines_and_colors: arab states have agreed to postpone a summit that was scheduled for may 11 in baghdad, the arab league announced on wednesday, amid disputes over the venue and popular unrest rocking the region.
